content.en: Multi-focus image fusion: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the quality of multi-focus image fusion. These algorithms are based on different methods such as Laplacian pyramid, shearlet transform, wavelet transform, and others. The algorithms aim to enhance fusion performance, preserve structure and detail information, and provide better fusion outcomes compared to traditional methods.
content.da: Flerfokus billedfusion: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af flerfokus billedfusion. Disse algoritmer er baseret på forskellige metoder såsom Laplacian pyramid, shearlet transform, wavelet transform og andre. Algoritmerne sigter mod at forbedre fusionsydelsen, bevare struktur- og detaljeinformation samt levere bedre fusionsresultater sammenlignet med traditionelle metoder.
